apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully illustrates a loving couple, a man and a woman, with their arms around each other and a glowing red heart between them, all rendered with Apple's signature realistic lighting and soft, rounded forms. The medium-dark skin tones are depicted with rich, nuanced gradients, adding to the warmth and genuine affection conveyed. This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, is a powerful symbol of romantic partnership, love, and commitment, bringing a sense of heartfelt connection to digital conversations.
